mapper.select: SELECT REPLACE(sgg_nm, #{sd}, '')as sgg_nm, adm_sect_c as sgg_cd FROM tl_sgg WHERE sgg_nm LIKE CONCAT(#{sd}, '%')
SELECT bjd_nm, bjd_cd FROM tl_bjd WHERE sgg_cd = #{sgg_cd}
SELECT bjd_nm, bjd_cd FROM tl_bjd WHERE sgg_cd = (SELECT sgg_cd FROM tl_sgg WHERE sd_nm = #{sd})
SELECT ST_XMin(ST_Extent(geom)) AS minX, ST_YMin(ST_Extent(geom)) AS minY, ST_XMax(ST_Extent(geom)) AS maxX, ST_YMax(ST_Extent(geom)) AS maxY, geom FROM tl_bjd WHERE bjd_cd = #{bjd_cd} GROUP BY geom
